languages.text: "Именем Золотого Трона, Ваша Светлость, смилуйтесь и спасите простых работяг, соль Януса! Вистенца Вьятт, неприкасаемый губернатор и верховодительница дворян, творит за закрытыми дверями что-то чудовищное. Она прикрывается интересами Империума и строит из себя ученую, но ее поступки... ее поступки лишь вредят нашей планете!"

traits.locale_text: "Потому что Вистенца Вьятт, неприкасаемый губернатор и верховодительница дворян, творит за закрытыми дверями нечто чудовищное. Она прикрывается интересами Империума и строит из себя ученую, но ее поступки... о, ее поступки куда страшнее!"

languages.text: "In the name of the Golden Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, show mercy on the humble workers, the salt of Janus — save them! Vistenza Vyatt, the untouchable governor and leader of the nobility, is creating something monstrous behind closed doors. She uses the Imperium's interests as a smokescreen and purports to be a scholar, but her actions... her actions are poisoning our planet!"
languages.original_text: "Именем Золотого Трона, Ваша Светлость, смилуйтесь и спасите простых работяг, соль Януса! Вистенца Вьятт, неприкасаемый губернатор и верховодительница дворян, творит за закрытыми дверями что-то чудовищное. Она прикрывается интересами Империума и строит из себя ученую, но ее поступки... ее поступки лишь вредят нашей планете!"

traits.locale_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, show mercy on the humble workers, the salt of Janus — save them! Vistenza Vyatt, the untouchable governor and leader of the nobility, is creating something monstrous behind closed doors. She uses the Imperium's interests as a smokescreen and purports to be a scientist, but her actions... her actions are poisoning our planet!"

"In the name of the Golden Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, show mercy on the humble workers, the salt of Janus — save them! Vistenza Vyatt, the untouchable governor and leader of the nobility, is creating something monstrous behind closed doors. She uses the Imperium's interests as a smokescreen and purports to be a scientist, but her actions... her actions are poisoning our planet!"

"In the name of the Golden Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, show mercy on the humble workers, the salt of Janus — save them! Vistenza Vyatt, the untouchable governor and leader of the nobility, is creating something monstrous behind closed doors. She uses the Imperium's interests as a smokescreen and purports to be a scientist, but her actions... her actions are poisoning our planet!"

"In the name of the Golden Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, show mercy on the humble workers, the salt of Janus — save them! Vistenza Vyatt, the untouchable governor and leader of the nobility, is creating something monstrous behind closed doors. She uses the Imperium's interests as a smokescreen and purports to be a scholar, but her actions... her actions are poisoning our planet!"

languages.text: 「陛下、黄金の玉座の名の下に、謙虚な労働者に、ヤヌスの礎である彼らにどうかお慈悲を！何卒お救いください！不可侵の総督にして貴族階級の指導者であるヴィステンツァ・ビャットは、閉ざされた扉の裏で恐ろしいものを作っています。帝国の利益を隠れみのに使って学識を深めると主張していますが、その行いは…その行いが、この星を汚染しているのです！」
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, show mercy on the humble workers, the salt of Janus — save them! Vistenza Vyatt, the untouchable governor and leader of the nobility, is creating something monstrous behind closed doors. She uses the Imperium's interests as a smokescreen and purports to be a scholar, but her actions... her actions are poisoning our planet!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、黄金の玉座の名の下に、謙虚な労働者に、ヤヌスの礎である彼らにどうかお慈悲を！何卒お救いください！不可侵の総督にして貴族階級の指導者であるヴィステンツァ・ビャットは、閉ざされた扉の裏で恐ろしいものを作っています。帝国の利益を隠れみのに使って学識を深めると主張していますが、その行いは…その行いが、この星を汚染しているのです！」

languages.text: “黄金王座在上，大人，请怜悯怜悯加努斯卑微的工人们吧！求求您救救大家！那个维丝坦萨·维亚特，高高在上的总督，和所有贵族的领袖，正躲在她的宫殿里，制造各种各样的怪物。她以学者自居，自称自己这么做是为了帝国的利益，可她的所作所为……她的所作所为正在毒害我们的星球！”
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, show mercy on the humble workers, the salt of Janus — save them! Vistenza Vyatt, the untouchable governor and leader of the nobility, is creating something monstrous behind closed doors. She uses the Imperium's interests as a smokescreen and purports to be a scholar, but her actions... her actions are poisoning our planet!"

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上，大人，请怜悯怜悯加努斯卑微的工人们吧！求求您救救大家！那个维丝坦萨·维亚特，高高在上的总督，和所有贵族的领袖，正躲在她的宫殿里，制造各种各样的怪物。她以学者自居，自称自己这么做是为了帝国的利益，可她的所作所为……她的所作所为正在毒害我们的星球！”

languages.text: «En nombre del Trono Dorado, mi{mf|lord|lady}, apiádese de los humildes trabajadores, de la sal de Janus. ¡Sálvelos! Vistenza Vyatt, la gobernadora intocable y líder de la nobleza, está creando algo monstruoso entre los muros de su fortaleza. Usa los intereses del Imperium como pantalla de humo y finge ser una erudita, pero sus actos... ¡Sus actos envenenan nuestro planeta!».
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, show mercy on the humble workers, the salt of Janus — save them! Vistenza Vyatt, the untouchable governor and leader of the nobility, is creating something monstrous behind closed doors. She uses the Imperium's interests as a smokescreen and purports to be a scholar, but her actions... her actions are poisoning our planet!"

traits.locale_text: «En nombre del Trono Dorado, mi{mf|lord|lady}, apiádese de los humildes trabajadores, de la sal de Janus. ¡Sálvelos! Vistenza Vyatt, la gobernadora intocable y líder de la nobleza, está creando algo monstruoso entre los muros de su fortaleza. Usa los intereses del Imperium como pantalla de humo y finge ser una erudita, pero sus actos... ¡Sus actos envenenan nuestro planeta!».

languages.text: "Im Namen des Goldenen Throns, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, seid gnädig mit den bescheidenen Arbeitern, dem Salz von Janus – rettet sie! Vistenza Vyatt, unantastbare Gouverneurin und Anführerin des Adels, erschafft hinter verschlossenen Türen etwas Monströses. Sie benutzt die Interessen des Imperiums als Fassade und gibt vor, eine Geehrte zu sein, doch ihr Handeln ... ihr Handeln vergiftet unseren Planeten!"
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, show mercy on the humble workers, the salt of Janus — save them! Vistenza Vyatt, the untouchable governor and leader of the nobility, is creating something monstrous behind closed doors. She uses the Imperium's interests as a smokescreen and purports to be a scholar, but her actions... her actions are poisoning our planet!"

traits.locale_text: "Im Namen des Goldenen Throns, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, seid gnädig mit den bescheidenen Arbeitern, dem Salz von Janus – rettet sie! Vistenza Vyatt, unantastbare Gouverneurin und Anführerin des Adels, erschafft hinter verschlossenen Türen etwas Monströses. Sie benutzt die Interessen des Imperiums als Fassade und gibt vor, eine Geehrte zu sein, doch ihr Handeln ... ihr Handeln vergiftet unseren Planeten!"

languages.text: « Au nom du Trône d'Or, Votre Seigneurie, soyez {mf|clément|clémente} envers les humbles travailleurs de Janus. Sauvez-les ! Vistenza Vyatt, l'intouchable gouverneure et chef de file de la noblesse, s'adonne à des actes abominables à l'insu de tous. Elle se sert des intérêts de l'Imperium comme d'un écran de fumée et se fait passer pour une érudite, mais ce qu'elle fait est... un véritable poison pour notre planète ! »
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, show mercy on the humble workers, the salt of Janus — save them! Vistenza Vyatt, the untouchable governor and leader of the nobility, is creating something monstrous behind closed doors. She uses the Imperium's interests as a smokescreen and purports to be a scholar, but her actions... her actions are poisoning our planet!"

traits.locale_text: « Au nom du Trône d'Or, Votre Seigneurie, soyez {mf|clément|clémente} envers les humbles travailleurs de Janus. Sauvez-les ! Vistenza Vyatt, l'intouchable gouverneure et chef de file de la noblesse, s'adonne à des actes abominables à l'insu de tous. Elle se sert des intérêts de l'Imperium comme d'un écran de fumée et se fait passer pour une érudite, mais ce qu'elle fait est... un véritable poison pour notre planète ! »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Altın Taht adına gariban işçilere, Janus'ta aklı başında kalmış son insanlara merhamet gösterin, onları kurtarın! Dokunulmaz vali ve soylu lider Vistenza Vyatt, kapalı kapılar ardında canavarımsı bir şey yaratıyor. İmparatorluk'un çıkarlarını ve âlim kimliğini paravan olarak kullanıyor ancak yaptıkları... Yaptıkları gezegenimizi zehirliyor!"
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, show mercy on the humble workers, the salt of Janus — save them! Vistenza Vyatt, the untouchable governor and leader of the nobility, is creating something monstrous behind closed doors. She uses the Imperium's interests as a smokescreen and purports to be a scholar, but her actions... her actions are poisoning our planet!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Altın Taht adına gariban işçilere, Janus'ta aklı başında kalmış son insanlara merhamet gösterin, onları kurtarın! Dokunulmaz vali ve soylu lider Vistenza Vyatt, kapalı kapılar ardında canavarımsı bir şey yaratıyor. İmparatorluk'un çıkarlarını ve âlim kimliğini paravan olarak kullanıyor ancak yaptıkları... Yaptıkları gezegenimizi zehirliyor!"
